oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Association Between Paratuberculosis Milk ELISA Test Result and Milk Production and Breed in Dairy Cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sorge, U.
Kelton, D.
Jansen, J.
Godkin, A.
Cantin, R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Paratuberculosis
Johne's disease
milk production
milk-ELISA
JD milk test
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Paratuberculosis, or Johne's disease (JD), is suspected to decrease the milk production in dairy cows. The objective of the study was to compare the individual cow's milk production on test day between milk-ELISA, JD-test positive and negative cows and to evaluate the relationship between breed and JD milk test results.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2007; 228
